compliant.section: 和碩處理及利用個人資訊之期間係至特定目的已達成、消失、變更時，或您與和碩訂定之契約均履行完畢、期間屆滿、解除或終止之日，於前開期間經過後，和碩即應銷毀、刪除；但另取得您的同意延長處理、利用期間或法律另有規定者，不在此限。
compliant.legal provisions: Storage limitation: Personal data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed;

compliant.section:
個人資訊之國際傳輸或委外處理
倘和碩因業務需要，有必要跨國傳輸您的個人資訊或委託第三方提供服務時，亦會嚴格要求接收方或受託者遵守相關個人資訊保護法令規定
compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations

compliant.section: 如法令特別要求應事前進行個人資訊保護影響評估程序並記錄處理情況，和碩將確實遵守。

non_compliant.section: 如果您自願提供您的個人資訊予和碩，請務必不要提供任何特種個資。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing of special categories of personal data; Explicit consent is required for processing sensitive data, and the policy should clearly specify the types of sensitive data collected (if any).
non_compliant.amend: This section should clearly define "special categories of personal data" (sensitive data) according to GDPR Article 9 and explicitly state that explicit consent will be obtained before processing such data.

non_compliant.section: 和碩就蒐集之個人資訊已採取嚴格資安措施，僅做合法、適當且充分必要之處理及利用
non_compliant.legal provisions: Integrity and confidentiality; Security of processing
non_compliant.amend: While this statement mentions security measures, it should be more specific about the technical and organizational measures implemented to ensure data security, as required by Article 32.

non_compliant.section: 所有蒐集之個人資訊均安全留存於和碩資料庫，僅有授權範圍內之人員得因對應的處理目的取得。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency; Information to be provided
non_compliant.amend: The policy should be more transparent about the purposes of processing (Article 13 & 14) and the legal basis for processing personal data (Article 5(1)(a)).

non_compliant.section: 除非事先經過您本人同意或和碩為遵循法律、法規或法院命令，和碩不會將您的個人資訊提供予第三人或做目的外使用。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing; Information to be provided
non_compliant.amend: While mentioning consent and legal obligations, the policy should comprehensively list all legal bases for data processing as per Article 6 and clearly inform users about their rights related to data access, rectification, erasure, etc. (Articles 13 & 14).

non_compliant.section:
Cookie的使用
為了便於網站運作，cookies可用作辨識網站造訪者、記錄網站上的活動、或記錄造訪者登入的內容、偏好設定等相關資訊。
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly mention that some cookies might require consent and provide users with the option to manage their cookie preferences. It should also clarify the types of cookies used and their purpose.
